page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT IN SUTTON IN A
page.content: Although the majority of people probably spend much of their leisure time watching television,there are a number of local entertainments such as the public houses and clubs which are open in normal licensing hours,and local football teams to watch on Saturday afternoons.There are two amusement arcades frequented by the young.In Sutton there is a banqueting suite which can be hired for dinner-dances,discos,meetings etc. Fairs come to Sutton twice a year and are held on the Lammas,as is an annual circus.The Ashfield show and a Bonfire Night firework display are annual events held on Sutton Lawn. Within the Sutton Centre complex is a small theatre where local amateur dramatic groups regularly perform. THERESA COULSON MARY LINACRE SIMON BATE RICHARD SPENCER.
